title: Comp Network Security
description: Fundamental concepts of network information security, including encryption, secure access methods, and vulnerabilities in network protocols, operating systems, and network applications.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3076 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 4110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 6607 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 3251 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
